title: Heaven Sent
description: Heaven Sent was an early draft of my new novel, The Romeo & Juliet Killers. I put it out on kindle and got these amazing responses. I want to thank everyone for their kind words which were a real support.The Romeo & Juliet Killers is published by Dedalus Books, April 2015. It is available in paperback or as a download from all the usual outlets.
author: Xavier Leret
